      • startRegistration

        public RegisterRequest startRegistration(java.lang.String appId)
        See Also:
        startRegistration(String, byte[])

      • startRegistration

        public RegisterRequest startRegistration(java.lang.String appId,
                                         byte[] challenge)
        Initiates the registration of a device.
        Parameters:
        appId - the U2F AppID. Set this to the Web Origin of the login page, unless you need to support logging in from multiple Web Origins.
        challenge - the challenge to use
        Returns:
        a RegisterRequest, which should be sent to the client and temporary saved by the server.

      • finishRegistration

                                             RegisterResponse response)
                                      throws U2fRegistrationException
        Throws:

      • finishRegistration

        public DeviceRegistration finishRegistration(RegisterRequest registerRequest,
                                             RegisterResponse response,
                                             java.util.Set<java.lang.String> facets)
                                      throws U2fRegistrationException
        Finishes a previously started registration.
        Parameters:
        registerRequest -
        response - the response from the device/client.
        Returns:
        a DeviceRegistration object, holding information about the registered device. Servers should persist this.
        Throws:
        U2fRegistrationException

      • startSignature

        public SignRequest startSignature(java.lang.String appId,
                                  DeviceRegistration deviceRegistration)
        Initiates the signing process.
        See Also:
        startSignature(String, com.yubico.u2f.data.DeviceRegistration, byte[])

      • startSignature

        public SignRequest startSignature(java.lang.String appId,
                                  DeviceRegistration deviceRegistration,
                                  byte[] challenge)
        Initiates the signing process.
        Parameters:
        appId - the U2F AppID. Set this to the Web Origin of the login page, unless you need to support logging in from multiple Web Origins.
        deviceRegistration - the DeviceRegistration for which to initiate signing.
        challenge - the challenge to use
        Returns:
        an SignRequest which should be sent to the client and temporary saved by the server.
